Package core

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ContactSenderInterface
    Interface every module to contact client (one module for each way we have to contact him) has to implement
    FidelityStrategy
    Interface fidelity cards have to implement
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Admin
    One type of User of the system : the restaurants' managers
    AsItIsSorter
    One meal sorting strategy : the meals ordered as they are
    BasicCard
    Basic card : one of the fidelity card
    CardFactory
    Factory to create the fidelity cards
    CardFactoryTest
    Test class for CardFactory
    ContactEmailer
    Class to be instantiated to contact a client via email
    ContactFactory
    Factory to instantiate a class to contact a user, depending on how we want to contact him
    ContactSMS
    Class to be instantiated to contact a client via sms
    Customer
    One type of User of the system : the restaurants' clients
    CustomerTest
    Test class for customer
    DateChangedNotifier
    Notifier watching for a changing date, to let Customers know the day changed and it could be the user's birthday
    GeneralNotifier  
    Ingredient
    Class for the ingredients of a meal
    IngredientTest
    Test class for ingredient
    JustOnSaleSorter
    One meal sorting strategy : the meals ordered just when there is a special offer
    LotteryCard
    Lottery card : one of the fidelity card
    Meal
    Class for the meals
    MealCreator
    Class to manage the creation of a new meal
    MealCreatorTest
    Test class for MealCreator
    MealTest
    Test class for meal
    MostlyModifiedSorter
    One meal sorting strategy : the meals ordered mostly in a modified version
    Order
    Class for the orders of a customer
    OrderCreator
    Class to manage the creation of a new order
    OrderCreatorTest
    Test class for OrderCreator and Order (every Order is born from an order creator)
    PasswordHandler
    Class used to handle operations on passwords
    PointCard
    Point card : one of the fidelity card
    Program
    Class to handle general operations required by the EYMS system
    ProgramTest
    Test class for Program This is the test scenario of our program
    Restaurant
    Class for the restaurants
    RestaurantTest
    Test class for Restaurant
    ScorableMeal
    Class extending Meal to be able to associate a score to meals
    SorterFactory
    Factory to get a sorting strategy
    SortingOrdersStrategy
    Abstract class for sorting strategies in general
    User
    Class to manage Users in general (customers and admins)
